metadata.title: CVE-2015-5116 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.302 and 14.x through 18.x before18.0.0.203 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.481 on Linux, Adobe AIRbefore 18.0.0.180, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.180, and Adobe AIR SDK &Compiler before 18.0.0.180 allow remote attackers to bypass the Same OriginPolicy via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2014-0578, CVE-2015-3115, CVE-2015-3116, and CVE-2015-3125.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.481ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.481ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.481ubuntu0.14.04.1').
